text: Total RNA was isolated from the young inflorescences at around 5 mm height with Trizol reagent (Invitrogen) according to the manufacturer's protocol.

protocol.text: The data per chip were analyzed with GeneSpring 7.31 (Agilent) using the default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.

text: Plants were grown on soil for two weeks under short day conditions (10 hr light/14 hr darkness, 20-21C), and then shifted to long day conditions (16 hr light/8 hr darkness, 20-21C) to induce flowering.
(Parameters: time unit = seconds, temperature unit = C)
